Question: They included mixes of various songs, musical pieces and comments made by this person that Dick James made into a demo for him.
Hints: They arrested this person and brought him to a local jail while the Japanese government decided what to do.
This person initially owned 20% of Northern Songs, which became 15% after a public stock offering in 1965.
This person's first serious girlfriend in Liverpool was Dot Rhone, whom he met at the Casbah club in 1959.
